I wear a large , it did fit but would like to compare to XL.  For now I'd stay with large. Now for the BAD.. the shirt I received is nowhere near the shirt pattern that was shown and still is shown. I didn't return the shirt because I still like it, but I was very disappointed by the disappearing colored dots.
